item.title: "电锯永不停歇米莱的支持在他的经济实验中幸存下来
item.description:
阿根廷自由主义者 总统上台后承诺削减开支。选民们深受其害，但民意调查显示，他的支持率目前仍在持续—   

。【原文：

Argentina’s libertarian president came to power promising to slash spending. Voters are suffering, yet polls show his support endures — for now.  

】

item.title: 阿根廷人支持米莱伊的经济大手术
item.description: 如果说哈维尔-米莱伊就任总统以来，阿根廷人的生活并不容易，那就太轻描淡写了，因为这个国家每天都在经历相当于经济手术的现实。【原文：Decir que la vida no ha sido fácil en Argentina desde que Javier Milei se convirtió en presidente sería bajarle el perfil a la realidad cotidiana de una nación sometida al equivalente de una cirugía económica.】

item.title: 汇丰对中东财富的争夺因退出和监管限制而受挫
item.description: 在汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc），一位本应重振公司中东私人银行业务的明星员工正面临着现实的考验。【原文：At HSBC Holdings Plc, a star hire who was supposed to reinvigorate the firm’s private banking business in the Middle East is facing a reality check.】

item.title: 与克劳迪娅-萨姆探讨萨姆规则的更多内容
item.description:
我们应该如何认真对待经济衰退信号？【原文：

How seriously should we take the recession signal?

】

item.title: 13 年来最持久的反弹使南非兰特跃居世界第一
item.description: 南非兰特出现了 13 年来从未有过的上涨势头。【原文：South Africa’s rand is on a winning run not seen in 13 years.】

item.title: 安哥拉运载硫磺的列车在驶往刚果途中脱轨
item.description: 一列由美国和欧盟支持的重要运营商运营的开往刚果民主共和国的列车在安哥拉脱轨。【原文：A train heading to Democratic Republic of Congo and operated by a key US- and EU-backed operator derailed in Angola.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯持有的美国国债增至大流行病以来的最高水平
item.description: 截至 6 月底，沙特阿拉伯增持了 40 亿美元的美国国债，使其库存达到了 2020 年大流行病以来的最高水平。【原文：Saudi Arabia added $4 billion to its US Treasury holdings by the end of June, taking its stockpile to the highest level since the pandemic in 2020.】

item.title: 外国人两个月来首次看空印度股票
item.description: 由于印度股市波动加剧、盈利不佳以及股票税意外上调，外国投资者对印度股市的热情大受打击，因此他们对印度股市的态度越来越谨慎。【原文：Foreigners are growing more cautious on Indian shares as more volatility, lukewarm earnings and a surprise tax hike on equities take a toll on the enthusiasm for the market.】

item.title: 投资者看淡八月跌势，股票型基金迎来资金流入
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一份报告显示，夏季金融市场的大跌并未影响投资者对美股的投资热情，美股已连续第七周录得资金流入。【原文：The summer selloff in financial markets hasn’t derailed investor appetite for US stocks, which recorded a seventh straight week of inflows, according to a note from Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚希望青少年接种 Mpox 疫苗获得批准
item.description: 巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）是唯一一家在美国和欧洲获准生产麻腮风疫苗的公司，该公司希望在一种新变种病毒扩散之际获准在青少年中使用这种疫苗。【原文：Bavarian Nordic A/S, the only company with a vaccine approved for mpox in the US and Europe, wants permission to use the jab for adolescents as a new variant of the virus spreads.】

item.title: 欧洲股市上涨，创五月份以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 由于对美国经济衰退的担忧有所缓解，交易商押注美联储将在下月降息，欧洲股市走高，并将创下三个月来最大单周涨幅。【原文：European stocks advanced and are set for their biggest weekly advance in three months as fears over a recession in the US ease and traders bet the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 乌克兰谷物贸易商称依靠黑海港口风险太大
item.description: 乌克兰重要的黑海谷物港口再次大量出货，但一家大型贸易商计划继续通过成本更高的内河航线大量出口谷物。【原文：Ukraine’s crucial Black Sea grain ports are again shipping out hefty amounts, but one major trader plans to keep exporting large volumes via much more expensive river routes.】

item.title: 一笔亏损 87.2 万美元的投资让印度市场主管陷入防线
item.description: 就在政府决定是否延长印度最高市场监管者的任期前几个月，一项近十年的个人投资又开始困扰她。【原文：A nearly decade-old personal investment is coming back to haunt India’s top market regulator just months before the government faces a decision on whether to renew her tenure.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦将纠正与苏联时代相呼应的虚假收成
item.description: 据副总理称，为了赢得哈萨克斯坦领导层的青睐，地区官员高估了该国去年的粮食收成，多达 300 万吨。【原文：Regional officials, seeking to win favor with Kazakhstan’s leadership, overestimated the country’s grain harvest by as much as 3 million tons last year, according to the deputy prime minister.】

item.title: 英国监管机构不会升级婴儿配方奶粉定价调查
item.description: 尽管发现婴儿配方奶粉和后续奶市场存在重大问题，英国竞争监督机构仍决定不再升级对该行业的调查。【原文：The UK’s competition watchdog has decided not to escalate its probe into the infant formula and follow-on milk market despite finding significant concerns in the sector.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服考虑收购医疗保健平台 Haodf
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团正在讨论收购中国在线平台Haodf.com，以加强其在医疗保健领域的人工智能服务。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. is in discussions to acquire Chinese online platform Haodf.com to beef up its artificial intelligence services in health care, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百货公司打折后英国零售销售反弹
item.description: 在夏季打折之后，天气转晴释放了百货公司和运动器材的消费需求，英国 7 月份零售额出现反弹。【原文：UK retail sales bounced back in July after sunnier weather unleashed spending for department stores and sporting equipment following summer discounts.】

item.title: 高盛称沙特阿拉伯将减少石油领域的巨额支出
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的目标是到本十年末在战略领域投资 1 万亿美元，预计投入石油行业的资金将少于最初的预测。【原文：Saudi Arabia is expected to put less money into the oil industry than initially predicted in its goal to invest $1 trillion in strategic sectors by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 7 月零售销售如期反弹
民意调查显示，瑞士人可能会投票支持更多自然，更少建筑
item.description: 根据下月公民投票前的首次民意调查，瑞士选民中的微弱多数赞成限制建筑和农业，以更好地保护自然和生物多样性。【原文：A slim majority of Swiss voters are in favor of limiting construction and agriculture to better protect nature and biodiversity, according to a first poll ahead of a plebiscite next month.】

item.title: 软银正在印度红火的 IPO 市场上挑选股票赢家
item.description: 印度炙手可热的股票销售市场为日本科技投资者软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：India’s hot market for share sales is delivering wins for Japanese technology investor SoftBank Group Corp., whose own stock has taken a hit from disappointing earnings and a reality check on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 他信之女白通丹-西那瓦成为泰国新总理
item.description: 泰国前领导人他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）的女儿帕通塔-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）在议会投票中获胜，成为这个东南亚国家的新总理，结束了法院推翻其前任并解散最高反对党的动荡时期。【原文：Paetongtarn Shinawatra, a daughter of former Thai leader Thaksin Shinawatra, won a parliament vote to become the Southeast Asian nation’s new prime minister, capping a tumultuous period during which a court ousted her predecessor and dissolved the top opposition party.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 路线— 多么短暂而奇特的旅程啊
item.description:
没有任何单一因素可以解释刚刚发生的市场波动。但其中有 2008 年的影子。【原文：

There’s no single factor to explain the volatility of what just happened in markets. But there are shades of 2008.

】

item.title: 佐科威在任期结束时宣扬以印尼为中心的发展理念
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）在准备结束其长达十年的国家领导人任期之际，称赞了他在实现经济稳定增长、促进原材料陆上加工、加强基础设施建设和减少贫困方面所取得的成功。【原文：Indonesia President Joko Widodo touted his success in delivering steady economic growth, boosting onshore processing of its raw materials, ramping up infrastructure and reducing poverty as he prepares to wrap up his decade-long tenure as the country’s leader.】

item.title: 马来西亚计划为公务员部门加薪 23 亿美元
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，政府将在十多年来首次修订薪酬计划时，将公务员工资提高 100 多亿林吉特（约合 23 亿美元）。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said the government will boost civil service salaries by over 10 billion ringgit ($2.3 billion) in the first revision to the remuneration program in more than a decade.】

item.title: 新关税生效后中国电动汽车在欧盟市场失利
item.description: 7 月份，欧盟的关税措施减缓了中国制造的电动汽车的涌入，因为该集团采取行动保护其汽车制造商免受低成本竞争的影响。【原文：European Union tariffs slowed the influx of Chinese-made electric vehicles in July, as the bloc moved to protect its automakers from low-cost competition.】

item.title: 日本股市每周数据再创新高
item.description: 日本央行最近加息引发的动荡又创造了两项纪录：上周，日本股市的流入量和流出量均创下历史新高。【原文：The turmoil triggered by the Bank of Japan’s recent interest rate hike has produced two more entries for the record book: All time highs for both inflows and outflows in the nation’s stocks last week.】

item.title: 不可想象的违约事件震撼中国可转债市场
item.description: 杨志明（Jimmy Yang）今年 5 月买入中国广汇汽车服务集团股份有限公司（China Grand Automotive Services Group Co.长期以来，中国 8010 亿元人民币（1190 亿美元）的可转债市场一直是一个收益微薄但稳健的绿洲，即使在去年残酷的市场低迷时期也能为投资者提供庇护。【原文：Jimmy Yang believed he was making a boring but safe investment when he bought convertible bonds of China Grand Automotive Services Group Co. in May. The country’s 801 billion yuan ($119 billion) convertible debt market was long an oasis of small but sound returns, providing shelter even during last year’s brutal market downturn.】

item.title: 印度私人银行因共同基金而黯然失色
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
